name: FA_NOTES_QUERY_RESP
description: Query data for the Financial Information Query.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the note record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: QRY_INCOME_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores data that was received in response to a financial information query from Financial Assistance. This is the type of income (I FNC 131) the patient or patient contact has.

columns.name: QRY_EXPENSE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores data that was received in response to a financial information query from Financial Assistance. This is the type of expense (I FNC 151) the patient or patient contact has.

columns.name: QRY_ASSET_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores data that was received in response to a financial information query from Financial Assistance. This is the type of asset (I FNC 171) the patient or patient contact has.

columns.name: QRY_FREQUENCY_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores data that was received in response to a financial information query from Financial Assistance. This is the frequency at which the amount applies to the patient or patient contact.

columns.name: QRY_AMOUNT
columns.description: Stores data that was received in response to a financial information query from Financial Assistance. This is the monetary amount.

columns.name: QRY_NUM_HOURS
columns.description: Stores data that was received in response to a financial information query from Financial Assistance. This is the number of hours the patient or patient contact works. This is used to calculate hourly income.

columns.name: QRY_PAT_ID
columns.description: Stores data that was received in response to a financial information query from Financial Assistance. This is the patient the financial data pertains to.

columns.name: QRY_PAT_REL_ID
columns.description: Stores data that was received in response to a financial information query from Financial Assistance. This is the patient contact the financial data pertains to.

columns.name: QRY_ERR_CODE
columns.description: Stores an error code that was received in response to a financial information query from Financial Assistance.

columns.name: QRY_ERR_MSG
columns.description: Stores the description of the error that was received in response to a financial information query from Financial Assistance.
